dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Hey, I've fixed all your stuff.

dialog.speaker: Bronson (Male)
dialog.utterance: I'll be damned. Thanks for doing that. Here - Zora sets aside a bit or two for people who help out.

dialog.speaker: Bronson (Male)
dialog.utterance: Before you ask, no, it ain't pay. Just being generous to folks who do a good turn.
